The Oblitercons:

::Dark One slammed his foot to the ground, pulling his sub machine gun from 
subspace, firing off six explosive rounds at the diagnostic droid's 'back'::
"If you don't pay us, we will take compensation by injuring you!"

::Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Quickstrike's injured leg::

::Breakdown fired a grenade off at Shredder's chest::

::Pyro fired off four flame balls at Sinesis::

::Scavenger fired off twenty armor-piercing rounds off at Quickstrike's 
injured leg::

"Consider that our payment.  But I am not without mercy." (Dark One nodded to 
Hiss, the scientist of the group taking out a small box of tools and a 
kilogram of energon, slid them over to Quickstrike)
::The Oblitercons slowly backed up, weapons still aimed::
"Try anything, and you die!"
